mapreader.download.tileserver_helpers.create_hf(geom)

Create header and footer for different types of geometries

Args:

geom (str): geometry type, e.g., polygone

class mapreader.download.tileserver_helpers.input_class(name)

initialize input class

mapreader.download.tileserver_helpers.latlon2tile(lat, lon, zoom)

Convert lat/lon/zoom to tiles

from OSM Slippy Tile definitions & https://github.com/Caged/tile-stitch Reference: https://github.com/stamen/the-ultimate-tile-stitcher

mapreader.download.tileserver_helpers.tile2latlon(x, y, zoom)

Convert x/y/zoom to lat/lon

Reference: https://github.com/stamen/the-ultimate-tile-stitcher

mapreader.download.tileserver_helpers.collect_coord_info(list_files)

Collect min/max lat/lon from a list of tiles

Args:

list_files (list): list of files to be read

mapreader.download.tileserver_helpers.check_par_jobs(jobs, sleep_time=1)

check if all the parallel jobs are finished :param jobs: :param sleep_time: :return:
